mapper.select: select no,title,bbscontent,email,bbsdate,hits,bbsno from (select no,title,bbscontent,email,bbsdate,hits,bbsno,rownum rn from ( select no,title,bbscontent,email,bbsdate,hits,bbsno from bbs order by no desc ) ) where bbsno=1 and rn between (((#{start})*10)-9) and ((#{end})*10)

select no,title,bbscontent,email,bbsdate,hits,bbsno from (select no,title,bbscontent,email,bbsdate,hits,bbsno,rownum rn from ( select no,title,bbscontent,email,bbsdate,hits,bbsno from bbs order by no desc ) ) where bbsno=1 and rn between (((#{start})*10)-9) and ((#{end})*10) and title like '%' ||#{title}|| '%'

select no,title,bbscontent,email,bbsdate,hits,bbsno from (select no,title,bbscontent,email,bbsdate,hits,bbsno,rownum rn from ( select no,title,bbscontent,email,bbsdate,hits,bbsno from bbs order by no desc ) ) where bbsno=1 and rn between (((#{start})*10)-9) and ((#{end})*10) and bbscontent like '%' ||#{bbscontent}|| '%'
select count(no) from bbs where bbsno=1
mapper.update: update bbs set hits=hits+1 where no=#{no}
update bbs set title=#{title},bbscontent=#{bbscontent} where no=#{no}
